snippet: Increasingly popular target-date funds may not be suited to every retirement investor, particularly those near or in retirement.
abstract: Target-date funds are intended to reduce stock market risk incrementally as investor gets closer to retirement target date; increasingly popular mutual funds may not be suited to everyone, particularly those near or in retirement.
lead_paragraph: Increasingly popular target-date funds may not be suited to every retirement investor, particularly those near or in retirement.

headline.main: Target-Date Funds Might Not Hit Your Bull’s-Eye
headline.print_headline: Target-Date Funds Might Not Hit Your Bull’s-Eye
